alert.note: Alert for Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 10:00AM MST until December 29 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches, with the highest amounts expected in the foothills of Boulder County. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Northern Front Range Foothills for primarily Boulder County. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet
